oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Video - Hernando de Soto Bridge
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hernando de Soto Bridge; Mississippi River; downtown; Mud Island;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: From Richard Hoffman's notes: "A drive across the Hernando Desoto Bridge - Summer, 1974. The bridge opened on August 2, 1973, so it was about one year old. On the second crossing, you can see a glimpse of the DeWitt-Spain Airport on Mud Island. It was closed in 1970 when construction began on the bridge."
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hoffman, Richard
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Justin Thompson; Gift of Richard Hoffman
